title: 40 Hz Study Music
artistinfo: The Swedish composer, producer and musician  has received great acclaim for his atmospheric ambient project Miracle Tones. Rooted in the study of frequencies, he explores the premise that sound moves matter and the possibilities of affecting body and mind with music. Working with a wide array of analog and modular synthesizers, Timo creates meditative soundscapes promoting relief and affirmative freedom.   Join the Miracle Tones Discord server: https://discord.gg/ymqQuSxPEX
